title: YIVIEW Sleep Mask for Men Women, 100% Light Blocking 3D Eye Mask of Night Sleeping Blindfold, Relaxing Zero Pressure Eye Cover, memory foam, skin-friendly, lightweight, adjustable buckle strap for different head sizes and shapes
descriptions:
YIVIEW Sleep Mask for Men & Women – 3D Ergonomic Memory Foam Night Sleeping Blindfold

Highlights:
- 100% light blocking: Deeper nose cutout seals out light from the bottom for true darkness anywhere.
- Zero-pressure comfort: 3D ergonomic design with deeper, wider eye pockets eliminates pressure on the eyes and allows free blinking.
- Makeup-friendly: Spacious eye cavities prevent smudging, ideal for naps on the go or before events.
- Premium memory foam: Soft, lightweight, slow-rebound foam that’s skin-friendly and breathable for all-night comfort.
- Smooth, clean fabric: Lint-free, fade-resistant material that won’t stain sheets or pillows.
- Durable, no-glue construction: Advanced edge sealing for sturdy seams that won’t easily fall apart; no marks on face or forehead.
- Adjustable, tangle-free fit: Buckle strap adjusts fully to suit different head sizes and shapes without tangling hair.
- Travel-ready: Perfect for office naps, airplane travel, nighttime sleep, and camping.

Details:
- Design: 3D ergonomic with deeper and wider eye pockets for larger eye space and zero pressure on eyeballs.
- Material: High-resilience memory foam with slow rebound; smooth outer fabric that’s soft, skin-friendly, and lightweight.
- Nose bridge: Improved cutout blocks stray light from the bottom for a blackout effect.
- Construction: Advanced edge sealing process (no glue) for added durability and comfort; leaves no marks on face.
- Strap: Adjustable buckle for a personalized fit; tangle-free for all hair types.

Why you’ll love it:
Enjoy total darkness and cloud-like comfort without pressure on your eyes or lashes. Whether you’re resetting on a flight, power napping at work, bunking down in a tent, or winding down at night, the YIVIEW Sleep Mask delivers a blackout sleep experience with reliable durability and a fit that feels made just for you.
